data.lyric:
[ti:Circles]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Circles - Mac Miller
[00:18.14]Lyrics by：M. McCormick
[00:36.29]Well this is what it look like right before you fall
[00:44.61]Stumblin' around you been guessing your direction except you can't see at all
[00:52.62]And I don't have a name I don't have a name no
[00:58.77]Who am I to blame who am I to blame no
[01:05.16]And I cannot be changed I cannot be changed no trust me I've tried
[01:12.65]I just end up right at the start of the line drawin' circles mhm
[01:28.82]I drank my whiskey you sip your wine
[01:35.24]We're doing well sittin' watchin' the world fallin' down it's decline
[01:43.01]I can keep you safe I can keep you safe
[01:49.50]Do not be afraid do not be afraid
[01:54.11]You're feeling sorry I'm feeling fine
[02:00.45]Don't you put any more stress on yourself it's one day at a time
[02:08.17]It's gettin' pretty late gettin' pretty late and that's fine
[02:15.48]It goes around like the hands that keep countin' the time drawin' circles
data.trans:
[ti:Circles]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:18.14]//
[00:36.29]好吧 事实就是如此 在你一败涂地前
[00:44.61]跌跌撞撞 你漫无目的地东奔西走 此外你一概不闻不问
[00:52.62]我不知道自己姓甚名谁 我不知道自己姓甚名谁
[00:58.77]可我又能怪谁呢 可我又能怪谁呢
[01:05.16]我无能为力 还是老样子 相信我 我已尽力
[01:12.65]最终我又回到了起点 只是原地踏步
[01:28.82]我把威士忌酒一饮而尽 你啜饮着红酒
[01:35.24]我们相安无事 无动于衷地看着世界轰然崩塌 衰败凋零
[01:43.01]我可以守护着你 我可以守护着你
[01:49.50]别害怕 别害怕
[01:54.11]你心怀愧疚 我怡然自在
[02:00.45]别再逼迫自己 活在当下就好
[02:08.17]已经太晚了 已经来不及了 不过没关系
[02:15.48]兜兜转转 就像掰着手指细数时间 只是原地踏步
